General.Name: Hoang Quan Consulting Trading Service Real Estate Corp
General.Description: Hoang Quan Consulting - Trading - Service Real Estate Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, engages in real estate, education, and finance businesses in Vietnam. It develops, invests in, and manages social housing projects, housing for workers, industrial park infrastructures, and residential properties, as well as invests in commercial real estate properties; and provides real estate exchange, brokerage, auction, and valuation services. The company also trades in porcelains, handicrafts and fine arts; interior decoration products; chemicals and packages; construction materials; various kind of timbers; and construction and printing machinery and equipment. In addition, it constructs civil works, bridges and roads; and offers financial investment, land brokerage, ground leveling, commercial brokerage, land surveying, vocational training, commercial advertising, and restaurant and take-away catering services. Further, the company provides preschool, primary, secondary, and upper secondary education services; and training for colleges, universities, and graduation. Additionally, it engages in the processing and preserving of vegetables, seafood, aquaculture, and meat related products, as well as produces dishes and foods; trading of fruits and vegetables, paddy, corn and cereals, forestry materials, seafood, industrial foodstuff, and aquatic products; and retailing of cereal, foods, beverages, tobaccos, and rustic tobaccos in specialized stores, supermarkets, and commercial centers. The company is also involved in the designing and prototyping of computers; and merger and acquisition activities. Hoang Quan Consulting - Trading - Service Real Estate Corporation was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.
